Package io.github.phoenixwb.phoenixutils.holder

Class Holder<T>

java.lang.Object
io.github.phoenixwb.phoenixutils.holder.Holder<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of held value
All Implemented Interfaces:
ValueHolder, java.io.Serializable
public class Holder<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, ValueHolder
Holds a single value, modifiable value
